actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the provisions of law making it a crime to issue a false Government crop report in order to expand such provisions to cover the issuance of any Government report of statistics or information.

summary.text: Expands the provisions of law making it a crime to issue a false Government crop report in order to cover the issuance of any false Government report of statistics or information. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 2072)

titles.title: A bill to amend the provisions of law making it a crime to issue a false Government crop report in order to expand such provisions to cover the issuance of any Government report of statistics or information.
